name: Hero Centered
description: Centered text hero with gradient headline, decorative backgrounds, and trust logos. Best for SaaS, Technology, and Startups.

tailwind_classes.section: relative min-h-[85vh] flex items-center bg-gradient-to-b from-primary-50 via-white to-white overflow-hidden
tailwind_classes.container: max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-20 text-center
tailwind_classes.badge: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-primary-100 rounded-full mb-8
tailwind_classes.headline: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl xl:text-7xl font-heading font-bold text-gray-900 leading-[1.1] mb-8
tailwind_classes.subheadline: text-lg md:text-xl text-gray-600 max-w-2xl mx-auto mb-10 leading-relaxed
tailwind_classes.cta_container: flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center mb-16
tailwind_classes.cta_primary: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-8 py-4 bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 text-white font-semibold rounded-xl transition-all shadow-lg shadow-primary-600/25
tailwind_classes.cta_secondary: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-8 py-4 bg-white border border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 text-gray-700 font-semibold rounded-xl transition-all
